document_data.caption: A map showing Teth on the coast of the Wizards' Reach.
document_data.name: Teth
document_data.mainbody: '''Teth''' was an independent city located just south of the country of [[Aglarond]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The city lay on the coast of the [[Wizards' Reach]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] just south of the [[Yuirwood]].
document_data.History: Teth was initially founded by the empire of [[Unther]] following the great wars between [[Narfell]] and [[Raumathar]], but over the passage of time Unther lacked the strength to hold it and Teth eventually declared independence in the {{YearlinkName|504}}.
